HASD.content: [in Christian apophatics of Dionysus] cause, gift of gift, order and promise are the same

F.content: “Cause” is designified in the crypt of anasemia, a trace w/ no present in its wake > Thing does not speak, is not a thing, its testamentary structure organizes funeral pomp of crypt

DIF.content: trace as way out of closure of classical cause & effect (but not sufficient outside its text)

CHM.content: legitimate renunciation of certain style of causality must still ask etiological questions [re: “act of force”] > can a strict structuralism even write a history?
what is Descartes’ affinity w/ his historicized period?

BSi.content: Celan: poem speaks in the cause of the strange, “vielleicht in eines ganz Anderen Sache”

OG.content: imposition of form via spacing, beyond classical model of causality, a new transcendental aesthetic guided by inscription: writing, as Rousseau intuited, linked to to nature of social space > inscription as habitation in general
